titles: The aunswer of Iohn Gough preacher, to Maister Fecknams obiections against his sermon, lately preached in the Tower of London. 15. Ianurie. 1570.
author: Gough, John, fl. 1561-1570.
publisher: By Iohn Awdeley, dwellynge in little Britaine streete without Aldersgate,
notes: Running title reads: The aunswer of Iohn Gough to M. Fecknams obiections.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
keywords: Feckenham, John de, 1518?-1585 --  Early works to 1800.
